{"id":1178430369,"question_id":3329,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1708225275,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"33 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1178430369/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Length of the Longest Common Prefix","memory":"55.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    \n    public class TrieNode{\n        TrieNode[] arr;\n        boolean isAns;\n        \n        public TrieNode(){\n            arr = new TrieNode[10];\n        }\n        \n\n    }\n    \n    TrieNode root;\n    \n    int max = 0;\n    \n    public int longestCommonPrefix(int[] arr1, int[] arr2) {\n        \n        \n        root = new TrieNode();\n        \n        for(int a : arr1){\n            TrieNode curr = root;\n            String s = a+\"\";\n            \n            for(char ch : s.toCharArray()){\n                if(curr.arr[ch-'0']==null){\n                    curr.arr[ch-'0'] = new TrieNode();\n                }\n                curr = curr.arr[ch-'0'];\n            }\n            curr.isAns = true;\n        }\n        \n        \n        int cnt= 0;\n        \n        for(int b : arr2){\n          \n            String s = b+\"\";\n            if(isPrefix(root, s)){\n                cnt++;\n            }\n            \n        }\n        \n        return max;\n        \n       \n    }\n    \n    private boolean isPrefix(TrieNode root, String s){\n        \n        \n        TrieNode curr = root;\n        int prefix = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n            \n            char ch = s.charAt(i);\n            \n            if(curr.arr[ch-'0']==null) return false;\n            max = Math.max(max, i+1);\n            \n            curr = curr.arr[ch-'0'];\n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        return curr.isAns;\n    }\n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-length-of-the-longest-common-prefix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
